1/*\ 2 * zoomrect 3 [ control ] 4 ** 5 * The zoomrect is an overlay control for zooming into a specific region of the map. 6 ** 7 > Options 8 ** 9 * autoRemove (boolean) whether or not the zoomrect should be autoremoved after a zoom operation 10 ** 11 = (DOMElement) the dom element that contains the zoomrect 12\*/ 13MapControls.register('zoomrect', function(opts) { 14 // initialise option defaults 15 opts.className = opts.className || 'mc-zoomrect'; 16 17 // this control will go fullsize in the container 18 opts.fullsize = true; 19 20 // initialise the zoombar element 21 var id = 'zoomrect_' + new Date().getTime(), 22 zoomrect = MapControls._createEl('div', { 23 id: id, 24 className: opts.className 25 }), 26 box, startXY; 27 28 // watch the zoombar 29 INTERACT.watch(zoomrect, { 30 aggressiveCapture: opts.aggressiveCapture 31 }); 32 33 eve.on('interact.pointer.down.' + id, function(evt, absXY, relXY) { 34 // if the box was not successfully removed before, do that now 35 if (box) { 36 zoomrect.removeChild(box); 37 } 38 39 // create our zoombox 40 box = MapControls._createEl('div', { className: opts.className + '-box' }, { 41 position: 'absolute', 42 margin: relXY.y + 'px 0 0 ' + relXY.x + 'px' 43 }); 44 45 // save the start xy 46 startXY = { 47 x: relXY.x, 48 y: relXY.y 49 }; 50 51 zoomrect.appendChild(box); 52 }); 53 54 eve.on('interact.pointer.move.' + id, function(evt, absXY, relXY) { 55 box.style.width = Math.max(0, relXY.x - startXY.x) + 'px'; 56 box.style.height = Math.max(0, relXY.y - startXY.y) + 'px'; 57 }); 58 59 eve.on('interact.pointer.up.' + id, function(evt, absXY, relXY) { 60 zoomrect.removeChild(box); 61 box = null; 62 }); 63 64 return { 65 element: zoomrect 66 }; 67});
